name: Lilith and Tally Review Valley Girl 1983
name_original: Lilith and Tally Review Valley Girl 1983
description:
I made a short VN for practice, in which Lilith and Tally review a Nic Cage movie. Hoping to do more of these actually, it was alot of fun.
